query:
SELECT id,
               CASE
                   WHEN async_thread1 = $1 THEN 1
                   WHEN async_thread2 = $1 THEN 2
                   WHEN async_thread3 = $1 THEN 3
                   ELSE NULL
               END as async_part
        FROM races
        WHERE async_thread1 = $1 OR async_thread2 = $1 OR async_thread3 = $1
